author: costin
msg: Initial version of the DynamicMBean proxy.
This version is supports only basic operations ( get/set, methods with no params )
using introspection.
Later we may do fancier stuff - like extracting the description and
filter the exposed attributes ( i.e. use a config file ), but what's
important is to have it working ( well enough ) with minimal effort
and to support existing components without anything special
( i.e. easy to do simple operations ).
Advanced things depend on some build changes ( my preference is to use
@jmx: javadoc comments - and that requires deps on xdoclet or similar tool ).

author: costin
msg: Avoid a NPE

author: costin
msg: A simple manifest to auto-load dependencies. Will simplify the life for those
using "java -jar"

author: costin
msg: Added jmx.jar lib and checking. Needed for the jk ( and other ) MX proxy.
Added a small manifest - with a ClassPath listing the deps.
Added the 1.1 target, since this can be used in JDK1.1
